attributes.action: Give S4 Pupils Prelim Study Leave
attributes.background: There is currently no prelim study leave for S4 Pupils, I personally think that this isn't a good idea and it would help the students a lot for studying for their prelims considering that they are very important

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

https://petitions.parliament.scot/
